verses.verse: For <WH3117>, behold, in those days, and in that time<WH6256>, when I shall bring back<WH7725> the captivity<WH7622> of Judah<WH3063> and Jerusalem<WH3389>,

I will gather<WH6908> all nations<WH1471>, and will bring them down<WH3381> into the valley<WH6010> of Jehoshaphat<WH3092>; and I will execute judgment<WH8199> upon them there for my people<WH5971> and for my heritage<WH5159> Israel<WH3478>, whom they have scattered<WH6340> among the nations<WH1471>: and they have parted<WH2505> my land<WH776>,
and have cast<WH3032> lots<WH1486> for my people<WH5971>, and have given<WH5414> a boy<WH3206> for a harlot<WH2181>, and sold<WH4376> a girl<WH3207> for wine<WH3196>, that they may drink<WH8354>.

Yea <WH6865>, and what are ye to me, O Tyre, and Sidon<WH6721>, and all the regions<WH1552> of Philistia<WH6429>? will ye render<WH7999> me a recompense<WH1576>? and if ye recompense<WH1580> me<WH7031>, swiftly and speedily<WH4120> will I return<WH7725> your recompense<WH1576> upon your own head<WH7218>.
Forasmuch as ye have taken<WH3947> my silver<WH3701> and my gold<WH2091>, and have carried<WH935> into your temples<WH1964> my goodly<WH2896> precious things<WH4261>,

and have sold<WH4376> the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> and the children<WH1121> of Jerusalem<WH3389> unto the sons of the Grecians<WH3125>, that ye may remove them far<WH7368> from their border<WH1366>;
behold <WH5782>, I will stir them up out of the place<WH4725> whither ye have sold<WH4376> them<WH7725>, and will return your recompense<WH1576> upon your own head<WH7218>;

and I will sell<WH4376> your sons<WH1121> and your daughters<WH1323> into the hand<WH3027> of the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063>, and they shall sell<WH4376> them to the men of Sheba<WH7615>, to a nation<WH1471> far off<WH7350>: for Jehovah<WH3068> hath spoken it<WH1696>.

Proclaim <WH7121> ye this among the nations<WH1471>; prepare<WH6942> war<WH4421>; stir up<WH5782> the mighty men<WH1368>; let all the men<WH582> of war<WH4421> draw near<WH5066>, let them come up<WH5927>.
Beat <WH3807> your plowshares<WH855> into swords<WH2719>, and your pruning-hooks<WH4211> into spears<WH7420>: let the weak<WH2523> say<WH559>, I am strong<WH1368>.
Haste <WH5789> ye<WH935>, and come, all ye nations<WH1471> round about<WH6908>, and gather yourselves together: thither<WH5439> cause thy mighty ones<WH1368> to come down<WH5181>, O Jehovah<WH3068>.

Let the nations<WH1471> bestir<WH5782> themselves<WH5927>, and come up to the valley<WH6010> of Jehoshaphat<WH3092>; for there will I sit<WH3427> to judge<WH8199> all the nations<WH1471> round about<WH5439>.

Put <WH7971> ye in the sickle<WH4038>; for the harvest<WH7105> is ripe<WH1310>: come<WH935>, tread<WH3381> ye<WH1660>; for the winepress is full<WH4390>, the vats<WH3342> overflow<WH7783>; for their wickedness<WH7451> is great<WH7227>.
Multitudes <WH1995>, multitudes<WH1995> in the valley<WH6010> of decision<WH2742>! for the day<WH3117> of Jehovah<WH3068> is near<WH7138> in the valley<WH6010> of decision<WH2742>.
The sun<WH8121> and the moon<WH3394> are darkened<WH6937>, and the stars<WH3556> withdraw<WH622> their shining<WH5051>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> will roar<WH7580> from Zion<WH6726>, and utter<WH5414> his voice<WH6963> from Jerusalem<WH3389>; and the heavens<WH8064> and the earth<WH776> shall shake<WH7493>: but Jehovah<WH3068> will be a refuge<WH4268> unto his people<WH5971>, and a stronghold<WH4581> to the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.

So shall ye know<WH3045> that I am Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430>, dwelling<WH7931> in Zion<WH6726> my holy<WH6944> mountain<WH2022>: then shall Jerusalem<WH3389> be holy<WH6944>, and there shall no strangers<WH2114> pass through her any more<WH5674>.

And it shall come to pass in that day<WH3117>, that the mountains<WH2022> shall drop down<WH5197> sweet wine<WH6071>, and the hills<WH1389> shall flow<WH3212> with milk<WH2461>, and all the brooks<WH650> of Judah<WH3063> shall flow<WH3212> with waters<WH4325>; and a fountain<WH4599> shall come forth<WH3318> from the house<WH1004> of Jehovah<WH3068>, and shall water<WH8248> the valley<WH5158> of Shittim<WH7851>.

Egypt <WH4714> shall be a desolation<WH8077>, and Edom<WH123> shall be a desolate<WH8077> wilderness<WH4057>, for the violence<WH2555> done to the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063>, because they have shed<WH8210> innocent<WH5355> blood<WH1818> in their land<WH776>.
But Judah<WH3063> shall abide<WH3427> for ever<WH5769>, and Jerusalem<WH3389> from generation<WH1755> to generation<WH1755>.
And I will cleanse<WH5352> their blood<WH1818>, that I have not cleansed<WH5352>: for Jehovah<WH3068> dwelleth<WH7931> in Zion<WH6726>.
